input_email_body:
Subject: Security Incident: Potential Data Leak in Health Records Platform

We have identified a potential security event in our health data management system You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. It is believed that the issue might stem from a security flaw in an external software component My name is Liu Wei.. We have already conducted virus scans and analyzed network protection records.
